group.desc: Dumps information about the system to the filesystem
Gives permission to everybody, including players who were directly prohibited
Prohibits everybody, including players who were directly allowed
Cancels an action related to the city
Gives permission to everybody, including players who were directly prohibited
Prohibits everybody, including players who were directly allowed
Cancels an action related to the plot

command.desc: Confirms a dangerous action
Show information about MineCity's commands
Reloads the messages from the disk
Reloads the protections from the disk
Toggles your admin mode
Dumps the block types and traits
Shows information about the city
Creates a city
Claims a chunk to a city
Automatically attempts to claim a chunk when you cross the chunk boundaries
Disclaims a chunk from a city
Teleport you to the city
Changes name of the city that you are inside
Transfer the city to an other player
Changes the city's spawn location
Shows a map of the cities around you
Deletes the entire city
Lists all cities
Put a city on sale
Purchases a city
Cancels a city sale
Creates a new group
Adds a player to a group
Removes a player from a group
Displays all city groups
Displays details about a group
Completely deletes a group from a city
Adds a player as a group manager
Demotes a player from group managers
Shows information about the plot
Readjust the plot's shape. Can be used to completely relocate the plot.
Creates a new plot
Renames a plot
Returns the ownership of a plot to the city
Transfers the ownership of a plot to an other player
Deletes a plot from a city
Lists all plots from a city
Put a plot on sale
Purchases a plot
Cancels a plot sale
Changes the nature's name
View who can enter the nature
View who can click blocks in the nature
View who can pickup dropped items in the nature
View who can harvest productions from the nature
View who can open containers in the nature
View who can attack other players in the nature
View who can attack creatures in the nature
View who can do structural modifications to the nature
View who can place vehicles in the nature
View who can use nature's vehicles
Displays all nature permissions
Allows players to enter the nature
Allows players to click on clickable blocks, like doors, buttons and levelers
Allows players to pickup dropped items
Allows players to harvest productions like crops and wools
Allows players to open container like chests, furnaces, frames
Allows players to attack other players
Allows players to attack creatures
Allows players to do structural modifications
Allows players to place vehicles
Allows players to use nature's vehicles like horses, boats and minecarts
Deny players to enter the nature, will not affect players who are already inside.

Allows everybody to enter the city, including who were directly prohibited.
Allows everybody to click on clickable blocks, like doors, buttons and levelers. Will also allow who were directly prohibited.
Allows everybody to pickup dropped items, will also allow who were directly prohibited.
Allows everybody to harvest productions like crops and wools. Will also allow who were directly prohibited.

Prohibits everybody to enter the city, including who were directly allowed.
